title: Rav Hirsch Meets Rav Bergman
body: Rav Moshe Hillel Hirsch, rosh yeshiva of Slabodka, met with Rav Meir Tzvi Bergman in Bnei Brak to discuss the draft-law proposal, a contentious issue dominating public discourse.

title: Turmoil in Ger Chassidus
body: A crisis has erupted in Ger amid fears that tens of thousands of chassidim's private conversations may have been recorded and could become public, sparking alarm during a private din Torah in Bnei Brak.
